message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our premium product. This exceptional item holds immense value to us at $1000000, but considering its importance to you, we aim to find a fair balance. We are offering it to you at a special price of $950000. This is a unique chance to secure an asset that could potentially be worth even more to you. Please let us know if you would like to proceed with this offer.
